articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Myanmar President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Myanmar President
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of sympathy to Htin Kyaw, president of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar, over a military plane crash in Myanmar that caused huge casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the Myanmar president and through him to the victims and bereaved families.

articles.title: Party Information Workers Meet to Pledge Loyalty
articles.content:
Party Information Workers Meet to Pledge Loyalty
Samjiyon, June 11 (KCNA) -- Party information workers for study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu held a pledge-making gathering before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the Samjiyon Grand Monument on Sunday.
					 The participants laid bunches of flowers before the statue and paid tribute to the President.
					
					 The speakers called for thoroughly implementing the last instructions of the President and leader Kim Jong Il without fail, holding them forever in high esteem.
					
					 They called upon everyone to defend and protect respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un politically and ideologically unto death and to become his genuine comrades and comrades-in-arms who share the idea, intention and affection with the Party Central Committee. They went on:
					
					 They said they will creditably take over the tradition of unity and cohesion and more firmly consolidate the single-minded unity of the Party and ranks of revolution centered on Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All worksites and posts should be seething for implementing the last instructions of the leaders and defending the Party's policies by dynamically conducting the information and agitation campaigns in an offensive and three dimensional manner, they noted.
					
					 Prior to the gathering, the party information workers toured the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station and held a meeting for expressing impressions on the tour on Saturday.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
Hamhung, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize opened with due ceremony at the Hamhung Stadium on Sunday.
					 Players will compete in over ten events including football, basketball, volleyball and table-tennis in Hamhung, Phyongsong, Sariwon, etc.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there took place a men's football match between South Hamgyong Province and Jagang Province.

articles.title: Great National Unity Is Way for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Great National Unity Is Way for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- It is the most essential and urgent job  for the Korean nation to realize national reconciliation and unity as it is to put an end to the tragedy of decades-long division and achieve national reunification, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 Noting that national reconciliation and unity is the basic prerequisite for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the article goes on:
					
					 Whoever with soul of the Korean nation should sharpen vigilance against the wicked moves of the outside forces seeking aggressive interests chilling the warming enthusiasm for improvement of the north-south relations and national reunification, and resolutely reject them and actively turn out in the way for national unity.
					
					 What is important for achieving national reconciliation and unity is to firmly preserve the principle of national independence.
					
					 The principle of national independence is the core of settling the issue of the nation and the basis for the great national unity.
					
					 National reunification can be successfully achieved only when the entire nation achieves great unity on the principle of national independence.
					
					 Dependence on outsiders who divided the Korean nation and cooperation with them cannot remove the mistrust between the north and the south nor can realize national unity.
					
					 Whoever sincerely hopes for national reconciliation, unity and reunification should advance along the way of national independence, not depending on outsiders.
					
					 Invariable is the idea of the great national unity of the Workers' Party of Korea to unhesitatingly join hands and minds and advance along the patriotic way for national reunification with those who have national conscience even though they had opposed reunification in the past.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Escalating Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Escalating Confrontation
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are following the outsiders' sanctions against the DPRK, being displeased with the latter's just measures for bolstering up its military capability for self-defence. Of late they supported the U.S. in independently releasing the list of additional targets of sanctions against the DPRK and the UN Security Council in fabricating its anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" 2356.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this is an unpardonable provocation escalating the distrust and conflict between the north and the south as they actively joined the U.S. and its vassal force's criminal moves to block the DPRK's bolstering up of its nuclear force and realize their ambition to stifle and pressurize it.
					
					 The commentary notes:
					
					 The DPRK's series of measures for bolstering up its nuclear deterrence in succession are entirely just as they are those for disabling and shattering the military moves of the U.S. hell-bent on a nuclear war against the DPRK by introducing nuclear strategic assets into south Korea and its vicinity and for defending peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities are trying hard to create a good impression that they are interested in the improvement of the north-south relations through allowance of some non-governmental exchanges while crying that they will make efforts for dialogue with the north and ratcheting up pressure upon it simultaneously to make it dismantle its nukes. Meanwhile, they are siding with the foreign forces that are resorting to all sorts of means and methods to intensify sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to understand that their acts joining with outsiders' anti-DPRK sanctions and going against the trend of the times are as foolish as those losing the support of the people and doing harm to them by themselves.

articles.title: Minju Joson Advises U.S. Not to Display Ill-advised Bravery and to Stay Calm
articles.content:
Minju Joson Advises U.S. Not to Display Ill-advised Bravery and to Stay Calm
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is mulling bringing the nuclear carrier task force Nimitz into waters off the Korean peninsula instead of dispatching it to the Middle East, according to military sources.
					 Days ago, the U.S. brought nuclear-powered submarine Cheyenne to the Pusan Port, exacerbating the situation on Korean peninsula.
					
					 They are letting out rhetoric that the intensive deployment of the nuclear strategic assets on the Korean peninsula is to counter the "unpredictable provocation and threat" from the DPRK and that the deployment would serve as "deterrence effect".
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson on Sunday ridicules this as useless muscle-flexing and exhausted bluff of the U.S., confused in face of the strong nuclear attack capabilities of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army developing at a very fast speed. It goes on:
					
					 Gone are the days never return when the U.S. could browbeat the DPRK with nukes of aggression. On the contrary, the DPRK has become the biggest menace to the U.S.
					
					 Regarding the structure of standoff between the DPRK and the U.S., the relations between them have already turned into those between the nuclear weapons states. It is a clear fact that the boasting of the U.S. strength doesn't make sense to the DPRK that has rapidly developed the nuclear attack capabilities and has already become the nuclear power in the East and leading rocket power in Asia.
					
					 It is a ludicrous behavior of the U.S. that couldn't discriminate its rival, making bluff. Embarrassed to see the behaviors of the Trump administration, the voices critical of the policy toward the DPRK are coming from even the political circles and scholars.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that its ill-advised muscle-flexing wouldn't change the situation and should behave with self-control and prudence.

articles.title: Minju Joson Calls for Throwing overboard Han Min Gu
articles.content:
Minju Joson Calls for Throwing overboard Han Min Gu
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, south Korean puppet Defence Minister Han Min Gu begged for a close "cooperation in the issue of north's nuclear and missiles," talking about "threats" at the "Asia Security Conference".
					 Traitor Han Min Gu is the top class servant of traitor Park Geun Hye, who ran amuck as a pro-U.S. lackey and in confrontation with the fellow countrymen and unpopular rule, Minju Joson Sunday says in a commentary. It goes on:
					
					 The history of hideous crimes against reunification committed by Park is also marked with dirty traces of Han, who is an accomplice of Park.
					
					 The top-class criminal Han who should deserve heavy punishment of public mindset, far from making apology for his crimes, are running wild in confrontation with the fellow countrymen. This once again proves that he is a confrontational maniac who should never be allowed to survive. 
					
					 Evil deed brings inevitable retribution.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand and assertion of all compatriots to make a clean sweep of Han, dirty bete noire who should be not among the nation, in the name of all Koreans.
					
					 It is the firm will of south Koreans to eliminate every remnant conservative of Park.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should be also held accountable for making such trouble-makers and scum as Han appear in the international arena running contrary to the mindset of candlelight actions.
					
					 The south Korean people will throw the group of traitors including Han, who committed countless crimes, along with Park to the dumping ground of history.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Calls for Digging up Tomb of Park Chung-Hee
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Calls for Digging up Tomb of Park Chung-Hee
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean civic and social organizations staged a demo in Seoul on June 6 demanding the digging up  of the tomb of traitor Park Chung-Hee, military fascist, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of Seoul.
					 There is no place for Park to be buried in the world because he, chieftain of the hideous military coup, who took power by force of arms.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Khabarovsk of Russia on June 1 with the approach of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display at the venue of the meeting were photos showing feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in party building and revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation and the DPRK consul in Khabarovsk. 
					
					 The secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said one of the exploits of Kim Jong Il was that he developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the invincible militant ranks.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il was the great man recognized by the world as he devoted his all to prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and the work for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 That is why we together with the Korean people significantly celebrate the day when he started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 We will further intensify the activities for introducing the noble life and exploits of Comrade Kim Jong Il and socialist Korea in the future.

articles.title: Rosy Is Korea's Future: Int'l Body
articles.content:
Rosy Is Korea's Future: Int'l Body
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- "Love the future!" The future of socialist Korea is very rosy as it is advancing consistently holding aloft that slogan.
					 The African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria said this in an article posted on its internet homepage on June 2.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 June 6 this year is a significant day marking the 71st founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) which clearly shows the world the true picture of socialist Korea's outlook on the younger generation "Love the future!"
					
					 The DPRK significantly celebrates this day every year.
					
					 A few years ago respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un paid deep attention to the work for splendidly holding the largest-ever celebrations for the 66th founding anniversary of the KCU in Pyongyang and granted the delegates of the KCU warm love and favors. He personally took part in an event and made a congratulatory speech even though he was very busy with state affairs.
					
					 He saw to it that educational facilities and leisure conditions for school youth and children were built in all parts of the country including the capital city of Pyongyang and KCU camps in scenic spots were remodeled successfully. 
					
					 This is arousing the great admiration of the world people.
